00: 74 03 20		MOV 03, 20
03: 74 05 21		MOV 05, 21
06: 74 00 22		MOV 00, 22
09: 04 20		LDA 20
0B: 08 22		ADD 22
0D: 18 22		STA 22
0F: 71 21		DEC 21
11: 28 15		JPZ 15
13: 10 09		JMP 09
15: 24 22		OPM 22
17: FC			HLT



74 03 20 74 05 21 74 00 22 04 20 08 22 18 22 71 21 28 15 10 08 24 22 FC
